author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Airport police on Tuesday registered an FIR against self-styled godwoman Sukhvinder Kaur alias ‘Radhe Maa’ for allegedly carrying a ‘trishul’ (trident) aboard a domestic flight last year. The FIR was filed after a Mumbai court ordered the police to do so.

Earlier this year, Asad Patel, an RTI activist, had approached the police and, subsequently, the Metropolitan Magistrate’s court in Andheri seeking an FIR against Ms Kaur. Mr. Patel had come to know that she had carried a ‘trishul’ on a Jet Airways flight from Aurangabad to Mumbai in violation of rules.
title: FIR against ‘Radhe Maa’
